io.apptik.comm.jus.util

Class DefaultBitmapLruCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.util.LruCache<java.lang.String,android.graphics.Bitmap>
      • io.apptik.comm.jus.util.DefaultBitmapLruCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageLoader.ImageCache, BitmapPool
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PooledBitmapLruCache

    public class DefaultBitmapLruCache
extends android.util.LruCache<java.lang.String,android.graphics.Bitmap>
implements ImageLoader.ImageCache, BitmapPool
    Bitmap LRU cache with option to save (soft) and reuse Bitmaps when removed from cache. As reusableBitmaps is a SoftReference means that we might not have really big pool thus re-usability and performance due to less GC will be not that high. For true pooled option use PooledBitmapLruCache.
